verses.verse: Then <S%H227><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> <S%H853><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the tribes, <S%H4294><s%> the chief <S%H5387><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> that they might bring up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> out of the city <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5892><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> assembled themselves <S%H6950><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> at the feast <S%H2282><s%> in the month <S%H3391><s%> Ethanim, <S%H388><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>
And all <S%H3605><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> took up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark. <S%H727><s%>

And they brought up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were in the tabernacle, <S%H168><s%> even those did the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> bring up. <S%H5927><s%>

And king <S%H4428><s%> Solomon, <S%H8010><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that were assembled <S%H3259><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> him, were with <S%H854><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> the ark, <S%H727><s%> sacrificing <S%H2076><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%> and oxen, <S%H1241><s%> that <S%H834><s%> could not <S%H3808><s%> be told <S%H5608><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> numbered <S%H4487><s%> for multitude. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7230><s%>

And the priests <S%H3548><s%> brought in <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his place, <S%H4725><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the oracle <S%H1687><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place, even under <S%H413><s%> <S%H8478><s%> the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the cherubims. <S%H3742><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> spread forth <S%H6566><s%> their two wings <S%H3671><s%> over <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of the ark, <S%H727><s%> and the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> covered <S%H5526><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> and the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof above. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%>

And they drew out <S%H748><s%> the staves, <S%H905><s%> that the ends <S%H7218><s%> of the staves <S%H905><s%> were seen <S%H7200><s%> out <S%H4480><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the oracle, <S%H1687><s%> and they were not <S%H3808><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> without: <S%H2351><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> they are <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

There was nothing <S%H369><s%> in the ark <S%H727><s%> save <S%H7535><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H5117><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> at Horeb, <S%H2722><s%> when <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant with <S%H5973><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when they came out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when the priests <S%H3548><s%> were come out <S%H3318><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, that the cloud <S%H6051><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%>

So that the priests <S%H3548><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the cloud: <S%H6051><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> Solomon, <S%H8010><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> that he would dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the thick darkness. <S%H6205><s%>
I have surely built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H1129><s%> thee a house <S%H1004><s%> to dwell in, <S%H2073><s%> a settled place <S%H4349><s%> for thee to abide in <S%H3427><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> turned <S%H5437><s%> <S%H853><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> about, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> (and all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> stood;) <S%H5975><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> with his mouth <S%H6310><s%> unto <S%H854><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> and hath with his hand <S%H3027><s%> fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> it, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Since <S%H4480><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I brought forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> I chose <S%H977><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> out of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> a house, <S%H1004><s%> that my name <S%H8034><s%> might be <S%H1961><s%> therein; <S%H8033><s%> but I chose <S%H977><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> to be <S%H1961><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And it was <S%H1961><s%> in <S%H5973><s%> the heart <S%H3824><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> for the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> Whereas <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> it was <S%H1961><s%> in <S%H5973><s%> thine heart <S%H3824><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> unto my name, <S%H8034><s%> thou didst well <S%H2895><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> it was <S%H1961><s%> in <S%H5973><s%> thine heart. <S%H3824><s%>

Nevertheless <S%H7535><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> shalt not <S%H3808><s%> build <S%H1129><s%> the house; <S%H1004><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> thy son <S%H1121><s%> that shall come forth <S%H3318><s%> out of thy loins, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2504><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> shall build <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> unto my name. <S%H8034><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath performed <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he spoke, <S%H1696><s%> and I am risen up <S%H6965><s%> in the room <S%H8478><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> and sit <S%H3427><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the throne <S%H3678><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> promised, <S%H1696><s%> and have built <S%H1129><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> for the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And I have set <S%H7760><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for the ark, <S%H727><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> is the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he made <S%H3772><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> our fathers, <S%H1><s%> when he brought them out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Solomon <S%H8010><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the presence <S%H5048><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and spread forth <S%H6566><s%> his hands <S%H3709><s%> toward heaven: <S%H8064><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> there is no <S%H369><s%> God <S%H430><s%> like thee, <S%H3644><s%> in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> or on <S%H5921><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> beneath, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> who keepest <S%H8104><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and mercy <S%H2617><s%> with thy servants <S%H5650><s%> that walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee with all <S%H3605><s%> their heart: <S%H3820><s%>

Who <S%H834><s%> hast kept <S%H8104><s%> with thy servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou promisedst <S%H1696><s%> him: thou spakest <S%H1696><s%> also with thy mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and hast fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> it with thine hand, <S%H3027><s%> as it is this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Therefore now, <S%H6258><s%> LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> with thy servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou promisedst <S%H1696><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%> There shall not <S%H3808><s%> fail <S%H3772><s%> thee a man <S%H376><s%> in my sight <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> to sit <S%H3427><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the throne <S%H3678><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> so <S%H7535><s%> that <S%H518><s%> thy children <S%H1121><s%> take heed to <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> their way, <S%H1870><s%> that they walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me as <S%H834><s%> thou hast walked <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me.

And now, <S%H6258><s%> O God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> let thy word, <S%H1697><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> be verified, <S%H539><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou spakest <S%H1696><s%> unto thy servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father. <S%H1><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> will God <S%H430><s%> indeed <S%H552><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the earth? <S%H776><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the heaven <S%H8064><s%> and heaven <S%H8064><s%> of heavens <S%H8064><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> contain <S%H3557><s%> thee; how much less <S%H637><s%> <S%H3588><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I have built? <S%H1129><s%>

Yet have thou respect <S%H6437><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of thy servant, <S%H5650><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> his supplication, <S%H8467><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> to hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the cry <S%H7440><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> the prayer, <S%H8605><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> prayeth <S%H6419><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee today: <S%H3117><s%>

That thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> may be <S%H1961><s%> open <S%H6605><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> and day, <S%H3117><s%> even toward <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> thou hast said, <S%H559><s%> My name <S%H8034><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> there: <S%H8033><s%> that thou mayest hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the prayer <S%H8605><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> shall make <S%H6419><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place. <S%H4725><s%>

And hearken <S%H8085><s%> thou to <S%H413><s%> the supplication <S%H8467><s%> of thy servant, <S%H5650><s%> and of thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when <S%H834><s%> they shall pray <S%H6419><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place: <S%H4725><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> in <S%H413><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> thy dwelling <S%H3427><s%> place: <S%H4725><s%> and when thou hearest, <S%H8085><s%> forgive. <S%H5545><s%>

<S%H853><s%> If <S%H834><s%> any man <S%H376><s%> trespass <S%H2398><s%> against his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> and an oath <S%H423><s%> be laid <S%H5377><s%> upon him to cause him to swear, <S%H422><s%> and the oath <S%H422><s%> come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thine altar <S%H4196><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> house: <S%H1004><s%>

Then hear <S%H8085><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> in heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and do, <S%H6213><s%> and judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> condemning <S%H7561><s%> the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> to bring <S%H5414><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%> upon his head; <S%H7218><s%> and justifying <S%H6663><s%> the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> him according to his righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

When thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> be smitten down <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the enemy, <S%H341><s%> because <S%H834><s%> they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against thee, and shall turn again <S%H7725><s%> to <S%H413><s%> thee, and confess <S%H3034><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy name, <S%H8034><s%> and pray, <S%H6419><s%> and make supplication <S%H2603><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee in this <S%H2088><s%> house: <S%H1004><s%>

Then hear <S%H8085><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> in heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and forgive <S%H5545><s%> the sin <S%H2403><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and bring them again <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou gavest <S%H5414><s%> unto their fathers. <S%H1><s%>

When heaven <S%H8064><s%> is shut up, <S%H6113><s%> and there is <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> rain, <S%H4306><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against thee; if they pray <S%H6419><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> and confess <S%H3034><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy name, <S%H8034><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> from their sin, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2403><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> thou afflictest <S%H6031><s%> them:

Then hear <S%H8085><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> in heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and forgive <S%H5545><s%> the sin <S%H2403><s%> of thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> and of thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou teach <S%H3384><s%> them <S%H853><s%> the <S%H834><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> wherein they should walk, <S%H1980><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thy land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> to thy people <S%H5971><s%> for an inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> there be <S%H1961><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> famine, <S%H7458><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> there be <S%H1961><s%> pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> blasting, <S%H7711><s%> mildew, <S%H3420><s%> locust, <S%H697><s%> or if <S%H3588><s%> there be <S%H1961><s%> caterpillar; <S%H2625><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> their enemy <S%H341><s%> besiege <S%H6887><s%> them in the land <S%H776><s%> of their cities; <S%H8179><s%> whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> plague, <S%H5061><s%> whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> sickness <S%H4245><s%> there be;
